boardgame.name: Runewars Miniatures Game
RuneWars Miniatures Game
Runewars: El juego de miniaturas
Runewars: le jeu de figurines
Runewars: Miniaturenspiel
Runewars: Miniatures Game
RuneWars: Miniatures Game
boardgame.description: For years, the armies of Waiqar the Undying have stayed within their borders, launching only minor raids across the border. But now, a nameless threat stirs within the Mistlands, and legions of undead cross into the realm of Terrinoth under Waiqar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s command! The Daqan Lords have sounded the call to war, and their finest generals lead armies of warriors and golems to take up defensive positions in the border territory of Roth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Vale. The first battles of the next great war are about to begin._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Runewars: Miniatures Game is a two-player miniatures game of battles between the great powers of Terrinoth. In each game, you and your opponent will gather armies of miniatures and lead them into battle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;blocks of infantry will maneuver for position, cavalry wings will wheel and slam into a weakened flank, and monstrous rune golems or carrion lancers will smash through formations of lesser warriors. Innovative command tools, two distinct factions, and countless ways to customize your experience combine to offer an unparalleled miniatures gaming experience in RuneWars. Finally, with forty-eight beautifully sculpted, unpainted figures, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll be able to paint and customize your armies to bring an entirely unique touch to your games and enter the hobby of miniatures painting!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;See also Realms of Terrinoth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Includes Mythic Battles Pantheon bundle.
2 players (Fantasy Flight Games) Languages: English

This is all of the Runewars Minis game material currently available, minus only the Amelyn Scion and Rune Golem expansion packs (which I bought but returned). Both of these figures are included in the armies in any case and as I prefer the smaller sized figures anyway, I decided I needed no additional copies. I have primed all of the heroic folk white and the nasties all black. This is a very nice flat color on both and I enjoy playing with them as they are with no further painting, especially the black. The bases have been clipped of the irritating pegs for the most part. I was going to use magnets but found they didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t need them, really (unless I hauled them around a lot), and work perfectly fine as they are with pegs excised. I will include a small packet of appropriately sized magnets if the buyer so choose. I think it would be awesome, personally, but haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t had a chance to effect it. That way (with a few trays worth of sample magnets) the new owner can see if they want to go that route. Tipping a figure out of the tray would be a nice, subtle bit of tactility, as would the pull of the magnet locking a miniature back in. There is just something magical about magnetism. Have played with sleeved (included) cards only. Much of the material is still in shrink. There is an extra set of dice. A great, complete collection waiting for someone to jump in with both feet. The basing, again, is finished product for myself. It looks great and clearly defines the moral polarity. Or, you can go from there to paint up your factions as desired.
